definition: tick/check mark (✓)/number for verification (serial number, seat number etc)/(fig.) two things match up
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people
to take one's seat according to the ticket number/(fig.) to put (things or people) in their right place/to take a general comment as a personal attack

sentences.english: Workers need to match pairs and size No. due to the different grains.
sentences.chinese: 由於資材紋路粗細不一致，需要配雙並對號裁斷。

sentences.english: The Green Checkmark Icon indicates closed ports.
sentences.chinese: 的綠色對號圖標顯示關閉的端口。

sentences.english: In the test the teacher marked all my answers right.
sentences.chinese: 考試中老師在我的答題上都打了對號。
